text.div:
VhDir Insurance Plan Cost Type

This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the cost type of a plan.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/insuranceplan
    CodeDisplay
    premiumPremiumPremium
    deductibleDeductibleDeductible
    capCapCap

name: VhDirPlanType
title: VhDir Insurance Plan Cost Type
description: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the cost type of a plan.
